pkgmetadata.longdescription: Apply Material Editing Effects // You can apply image processing effects that modifies the perceived material properties such as gloss, smoothness, and blemishes. This is an implementation of the algorithm proposed by Boyadzhiev et al. (2015) "Band- Sifting Decomposition for Image Based Material Editing". Documentation and practical tips of the package is available at https://github.com/tsuda16k/materialmodifier.
